prior_window_power_mean_query:
from(bucket:"myhome")
    |> range(start: -10m, stop: -10m)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "washing_machine" and r._field == "power")
    |> mean()
current_window_power_mean_query:
from(bucket:"myhome")
    |> range(start: -10m)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "washing_machine" and r._field == "power")
    |> mean()
